website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for locations with strict water usage ordinances. Most users will be satisfied with one flush, and the water bill savings are noticeable.
pros: Highly efficient flush assembly with vacuum assist requires just 0.8 gallons per use
Elongated seat and "comfort height" setting give maximum comfort
cons: Many essential installation parts and seat are not included
Some users report the need to double or triple flush for complete waste removal

customer_reviews.title: Saves water, quiet, and stays clean
customer_reviews.text: If you want a quite toilet that uses half as much waterer as a standard toilet, this is the one i recommend. I got 2 of them for my daughter about a year ago, and I got one for myself a few months ago. It was installed in the guest bathroom next to the living room. Now people in the living room cannot hear the toilet flush. And, if you are worried about water usage, this toilet is about as good as you can do. It reliably flushes away solid waste in one flush, and it stays cleaner than our old standard toilet that used over 1 1/2 gallons per flush.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Dessler

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Stealth Bomber of toilets! Quiet and saves a ton of water and money!  10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toilet! I bragged on Facebook about it! For 250 you get everything you need, seat, bolts, ring. Ultra quiet, uses almost no water, it's awesome! If everyone swapped out toilets in California we wouldn't have a drought! Buy it! Vacuum flush works great, never have to flush twice. By far the best and quietist toilet ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: octim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toilet!! Strong flush, low water usage.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toilet. Consistent single flush needed to fully clear the bowl. It is also prepared to flush a second time fairly quickly, which is nice if you need it. One thing that might surprise people is this toilet sits a bit higher than older toilets. I have gotten used to it and find other toilets too low now - lol I cannot recommend this product more, I am very glad I heard about it and decided to buy it. One tip: make sure you connect the water before testing the flush. It is power assisted by the water pressure, unlike older toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet So Far!
customer_reviews.text: I like really like this low flow toilet. Have had it a few,weeks. We had our handy man install it. Also loved that it was shipped as I couldnt handle another shopping trip and was too lazy to haul it in my prius. Fast shipping and was packaged very well! Some of the negative comments were that it sits too high. We are a tall family, so this is a plus for us. I don't think it's much higher than our old toilet tho. Haven't plugged it or had to double flush it yet. Very happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great - but its really tall.
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing how well it works with only 0.8 of a gallon per flush. We are very happy with them (we replaced two 3.5 gallon toilets). The seat height is really high. Much more than what I was expecting. I'm 6'1" so its not a problem for me but I certainly notice the difference and other members of the family report that their feet dangle now.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee !!!

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was all about the water saving of this toilet, but I was a bit skeptical that it would work well. We ordered it, and it's worked great for the last six months. Today we ordered the new dual-flush Stealth toilet to replace a second toilet, and we'll eventually order another Stealth to replace our third toilet. As you'd guess, we highly recommend this toilet. Also, we got our two Stealths along with the Toto SS114#01 Traditional SoftClose Elongated Toilet Seat, which we also like.
customer_reviews.author: krober9

customer_reviews.title: Tall and Handsome ;)
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it's just that we came up so very far from the slums of a ten, maybe twenty??? year old toilet in out little garage apartment that we remain so impressed with this Niagara; no one can be too sure (ha!). It was exceedingly easy to install and came safely packaged. It is quiet, efficient, compact, tall, perfectly deep, and super ergonomic. Couldn't be happier with the purchase; thank you Amazon and SupplyDotCom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Krest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toilet!!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet looks very nice in my bathroom and it's 17 inches tall so my knees don't hurt when I have to get up off of it. I love this new toilet, it's wonderful and it flushes quickly and quietly! Use a lot less water than my old toilet ever did! This toilet is going to save me lots of money on my water and sewer bill in the next 20 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rafail

customer_reviews.title: Niagara delivers a quiet yet powerful flush for less than a gallon of water - incredible
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the quietest and one of the highest quality toilets I have seen. Installation was a breeze, and watching the powerful flushing action belies the less than 1 gallon per flush.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kocur

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to replace the original water waisting toilet in my 50's house. After reading other reviews, I took the plunge. (It comes with everything you need, including a lid and wax ring. I purchased these bc others said it didn't.) You can flush and it's done filling by the time you're ready to get in the shower. It does sit higher, I recommend a squatty potty or small step stool to help your body get everything out. I purchased a slow close lid -delta 811903
customer_reviews.author: IraR

customer_reviews.title: This toilet is amazing. I bought one to try because we have ...
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is amazing. I bought one to try because we have a septic system and hoped the .8 GPF would be enough to do the job. problems, and, after six months, we were so impressed that we bought two more to replace other toilets. Best toilet we ever had, and stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: Love my new toilet
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware that for #2, you might need to flush a couple times to get waste further into the drain line. It is very quiet and the water fills back up in no time. Seat height is slightly higher than regular toilets. I love it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Works great when you consider that it only take
customer_reviews.text: We came across this toilet on a vacation in California and when we came home I ordered two of them. Works great when you consider that it only take .8 gallons for a flush!
customer_reviews.author: golfdome

customer_reviews.title: Works great, like higher profile
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 during remodel. Works great, like higher profile, no problems with flushing. As stated, order another seat, I ordered Toto SS11401 Softclose and love it too. Together great toilet
customer_reviews.author: Staceyk

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: It saves on water. It has a nice height to it. Never had any flushing issues and I have 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jets39

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet. Glad to have bought it and saving ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toilet. Glad to have bought it and saving lots of precious water. Works just as the company video presents it.
customer_reviews.author: Buick Man

customer_reviews.title: I kept the one I had and order another one just like it. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this model in another bathroom for awhile now, and loving it. For the little amount of water it use, it has more flush power then I can expect. So when it comes time to remodel the bath, I kept the one I had and order another one just like it. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived damages. Bad experience and waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mamoun  ali

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for a bathroom remodel - liked it so much that I've now replaced the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for a bathroom remodel - liked it so much that I've now replaced the one in my other bathroom as well. A real water saver and so quiet that you have to listen hard to make sure it's running properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Russell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOILET
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how well this flushes with such a small amount of water. Flushes and refills are fast and not nearly as noisey as some other modern toilets.
customer_reviews.author: dmd

customer_reviews.title: but I really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I've has other low flush toilets, but I really like this one. It is tall, but I have no qualms about recommending it. If you are paying for water use, get it!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Love this toilet
customer_reviews.text: Love this toilet. Love the height of it and the fact that it hardly makes any noise when you flush.
customer_reviews.author: Brob

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these to get Installed By Amazon Home Services.
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get these toilets installed, despite the face they show that they can be installed. This bait and switch. These toilets are overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D Dubroff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet environement friendly. Only 3 liter by flush !! Just litle tall
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Archambault

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The toilet works great and saves a ton of water! It sits really high which I like, the only thing I didn't like is it didn't come with a wax ring or a toilet seat. Overall I'm glad I installed three of these toilets because they function well, look good and save water...what more could you ask a toilet to do?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, extremely efficient, great flushing.
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet I have ever purchased. 0.8 gallons per flush extremely quiet flush and fill, the flush really takes all the waste away in one flush and it looks great. Very glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: now i bet i have the best toilet in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Loving it. Added a bidet, now i bet i have the best toilet in the neighborhood !
customer_reviews.author: Kingcpu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOILET
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how quickly it arrived. It was extremely well packed in foam and free of any damage. My plumber installed it and it went quickly into the place of the old unit. My wife hated the old unit because about 5:00 in the morning she was often awakened by the sound of plunging and repeated flushing. The Niagara is quiet and totally stunning as to how it clears the bowl the first time around. Expect to save a bundle due to both the low volume and the fact that one flush does the job.
customer_reviews.author: ACA327

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet, but there is something you may want to be aware of.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Environmentally friendly, works well on half the water of most conventional toilets. Some may have reported clogging. I have not experienced this. Once i had an incomplete flush, but if you have to flush a second time you still only flushed the same amount of water as one flush in a standard toilet. And i never experienced this again after I installed a Luxe Bidet ( Neo 110 ). ***Only thing you may want to be aware of : The tank components are quite different from most toilets so if any components should fail, repair / replacement may be an issue. ***
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherEarthling

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled my bathroom and thought a new toilet was definitely in order. I really like this product. It's comfy and flushes like a champ. I've never actually gone to the bathroom on a brand new, fresh out of the box toilet before and it truly was a great experience. I felt like a king claiming prima nocta.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Latt

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: We have now purchased these for every bathroom in the house. We live in drought country so the low water usage is important. They have never clogged! We love these!
customer_reviews.author: gaj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and very pleased it does what it's say it's does
customer_reviews.author: kenneth a klink

customer_reviews.title: Best economical, ecological toilet
customer_reviews.text: GR8 toilets! Bot 2. These are most efficient, lowest water use per flush available. [they also make a Dual-Flush model which is what I really wanted, but NOBODY has them in stock since March this year!] Super fast flush & refill plus Quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T Lim

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Just make sure you don't use too much toilet paper and clog up the toilet. This actually already happened twice, but with a double flush it'll eventually sink through.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: This has been a outstanding purchase. It functions as ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a outstanding purchase. It functions as advertised with NO double flushes to date. I had to purchase a new water line connector due to the difference in height of this toilet. All other necessary components where included with the purchase packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not enough water flow. Caused a lot of wast ...
customer_reviews.text: Not enough water flow. Caused a lot of wast line blockages. I had to trash it because it was used and no one would recycle it. $250 down the drain. If you choose this toilet be sure you have a 3" wast line and your close to the main sewer line.
customer_reviews.author: John N Baer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet, but lack of accessories
customer_reviews.text: The toilet works fine, and uses 1/4 the water of our old one. Installation easy, once we realized that it came with neither seat nor wax seal or flange bolts. I'd assumed that it did - foolish me. This is the contractor's package. (I'd seen these elsewhere in lots of 25.)
customer_reviews.author: George L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this toilet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this toilet . I should have bought two of them. I will replace with this one shortly. Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Dinella

customer_reviews.title: and not leave a bad review. But with the seat missing
customer_reviews.text: Although I paid for the toilet seat, it was not sent. The installation professional noticed it when he was working on installing the new toilet. There was also a chip on the toilet. But because of the bulk and weight of the two boxes, I decided to deal with the chip, and not leave a bad review. But with the seat missing, I am very upset. Here was what was included in my purchase: Removal and haul away of 1 old toilet (if required) Prepping of soil pipe, flange, and wax ring Setting of 1 customer-supplied bowl, tank, and seat Bolting toilet base to flange
customer_reviews.author: Yoda & Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: NOT DUAL FLUSH...
customer_reviews.text: OK. I needed to read more closely. This is NOT a dual flush toilet. I had assumed that all those with mounted flush were dual flush.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Got only the bowl, tank was missing. What ...
customer_reviews.text: Got only the bowl, tank was missing. What kind of quality control is that? I had to run around to return it and go out and buy another one at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Niagara 77001WHCO1 Stealth 0.8 GPF Toilet with Elongated Bowl and Tank Combo, White
product_meta.description:
Niagara Stealth 0.8 GPF Elongated Bowl and Tank Combo White - Pressure assist Flush, ADA Compliant, Floor mount/Floor outlet, Ultra-High-Efficiency Flush, Uses just 0.8 gallons per flush (GPF), Extremely quiet flush, EPA WaterSense labeled, White vitrous china, Elongated front, 12'' rough-in, One flush thoroughly evacuates the bowl every time-no double flushing, Kit Includes: 0.8 GPF Elongated Bowl + 0.8 GPF Tank (N7717 + N7714), Seat not included

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Niagara Stealth 0.8 GPF Elongated Bowl and Tank Combo White - Pressure assist Flush, ADA Compliant, Floor mount/Floor outlet, Ultra-High-Efficiency Flush, Uses just 0.8 gallons per flush (GPF), Extremely quiet flush, EPA WaterSense labeled, White vitrous china, Elongated front, 12'' rough-in, One flush thoroughly evacuates the bowl every time-no double flushing, Kit Includes: 0.8 GPF Elongated Bowl + 0.8 GPF Tank (N7717 + N7714), Seat not included
